IRpropMinusTrigPower Class Reference

This class offers methods for the usage of the improved Resilient-Backpropagation-algorithm without weight-backtracking enhanced with Trig and Power. More...

#include <EnhancedRprop.h>

 The absolute update values (increment) for all weights.

Detailed Description

This class offers methods for the usage of the improved Resilient-Backpropagation-algorithm without weight-backtracking enhanced with Trig and Power.

Definition at line 218 of file EnhancedRprop.h.

References dedwOld, delta, delta0, and deltaw.

void IRpropMinusTrigPower::initRprop ( double  _delta0 = 0.0000000001  )  [inline]

Prepares the Rprop algorithm for the currently used network.

Internal variables of the class instance are initialized and memory for used structures adapted to the used network. An initial value for the parameter is assigned to all weights of the network.

Parameters:
_delta0 Initial value for the parameter . The default value is "0.01".
Returns:
none
Author:
B. Mersch
Date:
2004
Changes
none
Status
stable

Definition at line 246 of file EnhancedRprop.h.

void IRpropMinusTrigPower::rprop ( const Array< double > &  in,
const Array< double > &  out,
double  np = 1.05,
double  nm = 0,
double  dMax = 1,
double  dMin = 1e-6 
) [inline]

Performs iteration of the Rprop algorithm.

The error of the used network for the current iteration is calculated and the values of the weights and the parameters are adapted depending on this error.

Parameters:
in The input patterns used for the training of the network.
out The target values for to the input patterns.
np The increase factor , by default set to "1.2".
nm The decrease factor , by default set to "0.5".
dMax The upper limit of the increments . The default value is "50".
dMin The lower limit of the increments . The default value is "1e-6".
Returns:
none
Author:
C. Igel
Date:
2004
Changes
none
Status
stable

Parameters:

Returns:
